title.text: Machine Translation and Automated Analysis of the Sumerian Languagé

abstractContent.text: This paper presents a newly funded international project for machine translation and automated analysis of ancient cuneiform 1 languages where NLP specialists and Assyriologists collaborate to create an information retrieval system for Sumerian.
2 This research is conceived in response to the need to translate large numbers of administrative texts that are only available in transcription, in order to make them accessible to a wider audience.
The methodology includes creation of a specialized NLP pipeline and also the use of linguistic linked open data to increase access to the results.
